sso.title: Single sign-on
sso.disabled: Single sign-on is not enabled on your account. Please contact your Fleet administrator.
sso.invalidAccount: You do not have a Fleet account.
sso.orgDisabled: Single sign-on is not enabled for your organization.
sso.error: There was an error with single sign-on. Please contact your Fleet administrator.

magicLink.emailSent: We sent an email to you at {{email}}. Please click the magic link in the email to sign in.

logout.title: Logged out
logout.message: You have been logged out successfully.
logout.error: Unable to log out of your account

forgotPassword.title: Reset password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email below to receive an email with instructions to reset your password.

success.title: Email sent
success.message: An email was sent to <1>{{email}}</1>. Click the link in the email to proceed with the password reset process. If you did not receive an email please contact your Fleet administrator.
success.faqInfo: You can find more information on resetting passwords at the

resetPassword.title: Reset password
resetPassword.subtitle: Enter your new password below.
resetPassword.description: Create a new password. Your new password must include 12-48 characters, at least 1 number (e.g. 0 - 9), and at least 1 symbol (e.g. &*#)
resetPassword.passwordHint: 12-48 characters, with at least 1 number (e.g. 0 - 9) and 1 symbol (e.g. &*#).

success.title: Password reset
success.message: Your password has been reset successfully. You can now log in with your new password.

changePassword.title: Change password
changePassword.passwordHint: Must include 12 characters, at least 1 number (e.g. 0 - 9), and at least 1 symbol (e.g. &*#)

changeEmail.title: Update email
changeEmail.subtitle: To update your email you must confirm your password.
changeEmail.confirmationSent: A confirmation email was sent to {{email}}

mfa.title: Two-factor authentication
mfa.subtitle: Enter the verification code from your authenticator app.

invalidToken.title: Invalid token
invalidToken.message: Log in again for a new link.

invite.title: Welcome to Fleet
invite.invalidTokenMessage: This invite token is invalid. Please confirm your invite link.
invite.description: Before you get started, please take a moment to complete the following information.
invite.passwordHint: Must include 12 characters, at least 1 number (e.g. 0 - 9), and at least 1 symbol (e.g. &*#)
invite.successMessage: Registration successful! For security purposes, please log in.

session.expired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
session.timeout: You have been logged out due to inactivity.

apiToken.title: Get API token
apiToken.info: This token expires. If you want an API key for a permanent integration, create an API-only user instead.
apiToken.ssoInfo: This token is intended for SSO users to authenticate in the fleetctl CLI. It expires based on the session duration configuration

noAccess.title: Access denied
noAccess.message: This account does not currently have access to Fleet.

apiOnlyUser.title: Access denied
apiOnlyUser.description: You attempted to access Fleet with an
apiOnlyUser.noUiAccess: This user doesn't have access to the Fleet UI.

ssoInvite.title: Welcome to Fleet
ssoInvite.description: Please provide your name to get started.

registration.setupError: We were unable to configure Fleet. If your Fleet server is behind a proxy, please ensure the server can be reached.

account.emailConfirmationSent: A confirmation email was sent{{senderAddress}} to {{email}}

errors.emailExists: A user with this email address already exists.
